thread.title: Jolly Ruthless
thread.title_full: Host Havoc Ltd. reviewed by Jolly Ruthless

author: Jolly Ruthless
title: Jolly Ruthless
text: I had a game server for three days. It stopped working while people where playing. Almost 24 hours later it is still down, I have submitted support tickets and was told it is being worked on. This was more then 8 hours ago and I have not received an update. I have canceled my server and ask for my money back.
